alert.note: Alert for Patillas (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 27 at 5:44AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive runoff. * WHERE...Patillas. * WHEN...Until 700 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 443 AM AST, Excessive runoff from previous rainfall is causing minor flooding in the Rio Grande de Patillas river. Road 184 in Barrio Jagual becomes impassable when the river is in minor flood stage. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
